Vigilante but it knows how to shoot more than once. (2070)
Attack: Variable
Defense: None

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Shoot someone at night at an Attack Strength of your choice (Basic, Powerful, or Unstoppable).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You have 3 uses of your ability.
You can use your ability multiple times per night.
If you are unable to kill your target, you will deal an attack of the same strength to all the players of the Unseen faction. If any would survive, cancel this attack against all targeted.
Win Con:
Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
